availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Francis Bell (Christian County, KY, physician and prov govt conv rep)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, physician. Virginia native. Married to Catharine Bell. Father of Elizabeth M. Bell, Darwin Bell, Frances S. Bell, Cincinattus D. Bell, and Catharine B. “Kitty” Bell. Married to Eliza F. Brown Bell in Christian County on February 1, 1839. Father of Mary A. Bell. Physician in Christian County in 1850. Owned thirty-two enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Physician in Christian County in 1860. Owned forty-eight enslaved persons in Christian County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
